name: Quadrato (CP Verlag)
overview: A puzzle and logic game created by Daniel Horst and published in Magic Disk 64 1990/06 in Germany and in International Games n.3 (marzo 1991) in Italy under the name Murator. Quadrato is a puzzle game where the aim is to place all the stones in the holes provided for them. While this sounds simple enough, it does take some thought.
